Challenge

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • Challenge.Controller

  • class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is designed to be used to allows the player to be controlled by the user. It allows the input of arrow keys in order to move the player.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    George Carpenterm, Ioan Mazurca

        event - The event to be read.
        level - The level being played
        game - The game to be altered and re-rendered.

        panes - The panes that can be changed between as a result
